vision: Intelligent bank transaction and expense management platform for Russian businesses using 1C ERP

target_audience.primary: Russian SME Finance/Accounting Teams managing corporate bank transactions and expenses, typically working with 1C ERP systems
secondary: Business owners/founders needing expense visibility and approval control
Accountants reconciling bank statements with internal expense records
Finance managers analyzing spending patterns and cash flow

phases.name: MVP Completion
phases.description: Complete core MVP functionality with essential missing features to ensure production-readiness and address critical user needs

milestones.title: Export & Reporting Ready
milestones.description: Users can export analytics data and generate reports for stakeholders

milestones.title: Document Management Live
milestones.description: Users can attach invoices and supporting documents to expense requests

milestones.title: Notifications Enabled
milestones.description: Approval workflow notifications are automated via email

milestones.title: Quality Assured
milestones.description: Comprehensive test coverage ensures production stability

milestones.title: Mobile-Accessible
milestones.description: Finance teams can access the platform from mobile devices

phases.name: User Experience Enhancement
phases.description: Improve user experience with audit trails, enhanced analytics, and better categorization intelligence

milestones.title: Full Audit Compliance
milestones.description: All actions are logged with complete audit trail for compliance

milestones.title: Budget Control Live
milestones.description: Finance managers can plan and track budgets against actuals

milestones.title: Intelligent Categorization v2
milestones.description: Smart category suggestions with confidence scoring

milestones.title: Internationalization Ready
milestones.description: Platform supports English for international teams

phases.name: Advanced Analytics & Scale
phases.description: Add advanced analytics capabilities, custom reporting, and prepare for scaling to larger customers

milestones.title: Custom Reporting Engine
milestones.description: Users can create and schedule custom reports

milestones.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
milestones.description: Interactive analytics with drill-down and comparisons

milestones.title: Team Collaboration Enhanced
milestones.description: Multi-level approvals and task assignment capabilities

phases.name: Future Vision
phases.description: Long-term features including AI/ML capabilities, direct bank integrations, and enterprise features

milestones.title: AI-Powered Finance
milestones.description: Machine learning for anomaly detection and smart forecasting

milestones.title: Direct Bank Integration
milestones.description: Real-time bank data without 1C intermediary for supported banks

milestones.title: Enterprise Ready
milestones.description: Multi-tenant and white-label capabilities for enterprise clients

features.title: Complete Analytics Export Functionality
features.description: Implement the TODO in BankTransactionsAnalyticsPage.tsx to enable users to export analytics data to Excel and PDF formats. Include cash flow reports, category breakdowns, and counterparty analysis exports.
features.rationale: Finance teams need to share reports with stakeholders who don't have system access. This addresses competitor pain-5-5 (Excel poor analytics) by providing structured export from a modern analytics platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can export analytics dashboard data to Excel format
Users can export analytics to PDF format with charts
Export includes date range, filters applied, and generation timestamp
Export completes within 10 seconds for typical data volumes
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to export spending analytics to Excel so that I can share reports with executives
As an Accountant, I want to export category breakdown to PDF so that I can attach it to audit documentation

features.title: Document Attachment for Expenses
features.description: Allow users to attach invoices, receipts, and supporting documents to expense requests. Support common file formats (PDF, images, Excel). Store documents securely and display them in expense detail view.
features.rationale: Expense requests without supporting documents lack audit trail and slow down approval. This addresses the manual workflow pain point where documents are exchanged via email or shared folders.
acceptance_criteria: Users can upload PDF, PNG, JPG, and XLSX files to expense requests
Maximum file size of 10MB per file, up to 5 files per expense
Documents are displayed in expense detail modal with preview/download
Documents are persisted and survive expense status changes
Approvers can view attached documents when reviewing expense requests
user_stories: As a Requester, I want to attach an invoice to my expense request so that the approver has all necessary documentation
As an Approver, I want to view attached documents so that I can verify the expense before approving

features.title: Email Notifications for Approval Workflow
features.description: Send email notifications for key approval workflow events: expense submitted for approval, expense approved/rejected, expense requires attention. Include links to the expense detail page.
features.rationale: Without notifications, approvers must constantly check the system for pending approvals, causing delays. This addresses competitor pain-1-5 and pain-5-6 about lack of integrated approval workflow notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Email sent to approver when expense is submitted for approval
Email sent to requester when expense is approved with approval details
Email sent to requester when expense is rejected with reason
Emails include direct link to expense in the system
Users can configure notification preferences (opt-out option)
Email templates are in Russian with professional formatting
user_stories: As an Approver, I want to receive email notification when an expense needs my approval so that I can review it promptly
As a Requester, I want to receive email notification when my expense is approved or rejected so that I know the status without logging in

features.title: Backend API Test Coverage
features.description: Implement comprehensive unit and integration tests for the FastAPI backend. Cover critical paths: authentication, bank transaction CRUD, categorization rules engine, expense workflow, and 1C sync.
features.rationale: The tests directory is currently empty. Production systems require test coverage to prevent regressions and ensure reliability. This is a critical technical debt item.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests for all API endpoints with >80% code coverage
Integration tests for database operations
Tests for categorization rules engine logic
Tests for 1C OData sync functionality (with mocks)
CI/CD pipeline runs tests on every commit
Test documentation for future contributors
user_stories: As a Developer, I want comprehensive test coverage so that I can refactor code confidently without breaking functionality

features.title: Frontend Component Test Coverage
features.description: Add React component tests using Vitest and React Testing Library. Cover critical UI components: transaction table, categorization modals, expense forms, and analytics charts.
features.rationale: Frontend testing ensures UI reliability and prevents regressions when making changes to complex components like the categorization rules interface.
acceptance_criteria: Unit tests for key React components with >60% coverage
Integration tests for complex forms (expense creation, rule creation)
Snapshot tests for stable UI components
Tests run in CI/CD pipeline
user_stories: As a Developer, I want frontend tests so that I can update UI components confidently

features.title: Mobile-Responsive Design
features.description: Implement responsive design for key pages to enable mobile access. Prioritize: expense approval view, transaction list, and analytics dashboard. Use Ant Design responsive utilities.
features.rationale: Finance managers and approvers need mobile access for quick approvals when away from desk. This addresses the usage context of periodic mobile access for time-sensitive approvals.
acceptance_criteria: Expense list and detail pages are usable on mobile (320px+ width)
Approval actions (approve/reject) work on mobile
Transaction list has mobile-optimized view with essential columns
Navigation menu collapses to hamburger on mobile
Charts in analytics dashboard resize appropriately
user_stories: As a Manager, I want to approve expense requests from my phone so that I don't delay the team when traveling
As an Accountant, I want to check transaction status from my phone so that I can respond to urgent questions

features.title: Audit Trail / Activity Log
features.description: Implement comprehensive activity logging visible in the UI. Track all changes to expenses, transactions, categories, and rules. Show who made changes, when, and what changed.
features.rationale: For compliance and accountability, finance teams need to see who changed what and when. This is critical for audit purposes and resolving discrepancies.
acceptance_criteria: All CRUD operations on expenses are logged with user, timestamp, and changes
Transaction categorization changes are logged
Audit log is viewable in expense/transaction detail modals
Admin users can view global activity log
Logs are retained for at least 3 years
Logs can be exported for audit purposes
user_stories: As an Auditor, I want to see the history of changes to an expense so that I can verify the approval process was followed
As a Manager, I want to see who categorized a transaction so that I can follow up if needed

features.title: Budget Planning and Tracking
features.description: Allow users to set budget limits by category and time period. Show budget vs. actual spending in analytics. Alert when approaching or exceeding budget limits.
features.rationale: Finance managers need to plan budgets and track actual spending against plans. This addresses a known gap in the current feature set and differentiates from competitors.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create budget entries with category, amount, and period (monthly/quarterly/annual)
Analytics dashboard shows budget vs. actual spending by category
Visual indicators (red/yellow/green) show budget status
Alert when spending reaches 80% and 100% of budget
Budget history is maintained for year-over-year comparison
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to set monthly budgets by category so that I can control spending
As a Manager, I want to see how much budget remains in my categories so that I can make informed spending decisions

features.title: Enhanced Category Suggestions with Confidence Scoring
features.description: Improve the categorization suggestion system to show confidence scores and explain why a category is suggested. Allow users to see multiple suggestions ranked by confidence.
features.rationale: Users need to trust auto-categorization. Showing confidence scores and reasoning helps users verify suggestions and improves the learning loop for the rules engine. This is a key differentiator vs competitors.
acceptance_criteria: Category suggestions show confidence percentage (0-100%)
Users can see why a category was suggested (e.g., 'Based on counterparty INN match')
Top 3 category suggestions are shown when multiple rules match
Users can accept suggestion with one click or choose alternative
Accepted suggestions contribute to rule confidence improvement
user_stories: As an Accountant, I want to see why a category was suggested so that I can verify it's correct
As a Manager, I want to see the confidence level of auto-categorizations so that I know when manual review is needed

features.title: Bulk Category Application from Patterns
features.description: Allow users to apply a categorization rule to all matching historical transactions at once. Show preview of affected transactions before applying.
features.rationale: When users create a new rule, they often want to apply it retroactively to historical data. This saves significant time compared to re-categorizing transactions one by one.
acceptance_criteria: When creating/editing a rule, users can preview matching uncategorized transactions
Users can choose to apply the rule to all matching transactions
Bulk application shows progress indicator for large datasets
Undo capability within 24 hours for bulk category applications
Audit log records bulk category changes
user_stories: As an Accountant, I want to apply a new rule to historical transactions so that I don't have to categorize them manually
As a Manager, I want to preview which transactions will be affected before bulk applying a rule

features.title: Multi-Language Support (English)
features.description: Add English language support to the frontend. Implement i18n framework and translate all UI strings. Allow users to switch language in settings.
features.rationale: International teams and subsidiaries of Russian companies may have English-speaking staff. English support expands the potential user base.
acceptance_criteria: i18n framework (react-intl or similar) is implemented
All UI strings are externalized to translation files
Complete English translation of all UI elements
Language switcher in user settings
Default language based on browser settings
user_stories: As an English-speaking Manager, I want to use the system in English so that I can work efficiently
As a Russian Accountant with English-speaking colleagues, I want to share the system with them

features.title: Custom Report Builder
features.description: Allow users to create custom reports by selecting data fields, filters, groupings, and visualizations. Save report templates for reuse.
features.rationale: Different stakeholders need different views of financial data. A custom report builder reduces dependency on pre-built reports and addresses competitor pain-1-4 about requiring report builder knowledge.
acceptance_criteria: Users can select data source (transactions, expenses, categories)
Users can add filters, date ranges, and groupings
Users can choose chart type (bar, line, pie) or table format
Reports can be saved as templates
Reports can be scheduled for automatic email delivery
Reports export to Excel and PDF
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to create custom reports so that I can analyze data in ways specific to my business
As an Accountant, I want to save report templates so that I don't recreate reports every month

features.title: Interactive Analytics with Drill-Down
features.description: Enhance analytics dashboard with interactive drill-down capabilities. Click on a chart segment to see underlying transactions. Add comparison views (month-over-month, year-over-year).
features.rationale: Static charts are limited. Interactive drill-down allows users to investigate anomalies and understand trends without switching between pages.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a chart segment shows filtered transaction list
Breadcrumb navigation shows drill-down path
Comparison toggle for previous period (month/quarter/year)
Trend indicators (up/down arrows with percentage change)
Deep links to specific analytics views for sharing
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to click on a category in the pie chart to see the transactions so that I can investigate spending
As a Manager, I want to compare this month to last month so that I can identify spending changes

features.title: Cash Flow Forecasting
features.description: Add basic cash flow forecasting based on historical patterns and regular payments. Show projected cash flow for next 30/60/90 days.
features.rationale: Finance managers need forward-looking insights, not just historical data. Forecasting based on detected regular payment patterns adds significant value.
acceptance_criteria: System projects incoming and outgoing cash based on regular patterns
Forecast includes known approved but unpaid expenses
Visual cash flow forecast chart for next 30/60/90 days
Forecast accuracy is tracked and displayed
Users can adjust forecast assumptions manually
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to see cash flow forecast so that I can plan for upcoming expenses
As a Business Owner, I want to know projected cash position so that I can make investment decisions

features.title: Multi-Level Approval Workflow
features.description: Implement configurable multi-level approval chains. Different expense amounts or categories can require different approval paths. Support parallel and sequential approvals.
features.rationale: Larger SMEs need more sophisticated approval workflows where expenses above certain thresholds require additional approvals. This addresses competitor limitations in approval complexity.
acceptance_criteria: Admins can configure approval rules based on amount thresholds
Approval chain can include 2-3 levels
Each level shows current status and pending approver
Escalation after configurable timeout
Delegation capability when approver is unavailable
user_stories: As an Admin, I want to configure approval rules so that large expenses require founder approval
As a Manager, I want to delegate my approval authority when on vacation

features.title: Task Assignment and Comments
features.description: Allow users to assign tasks related to transactions or expenses to team members. Add commenting functionality for collaboration on specific items.
features.rationale: Finance teams need to collaborate on complex items. Task assignment and comments reduce email/messenger overhead and keep context in the system.
acceptance_criteria: Users can assign tasks related to a transaction or expense
Tasks have due dates and status (open/completed)
Users can add comments to transactions and expenses
Comments support @mentions for notifications
Task dashboard shows all assigned tasks
user_stories: As a Manager, I want to assign an accountant to verify a transaction so that work is tracked
As an Accountant, I want to comment on a transaction to note my findings

features.title: ML-Powered Auto-Categorization
features.description: Implement machine learning model for transaction categorization that learns from user corrections. Improves over time based on organization's specific patterns.
features.rationale: Rule-based categorization is powerful but limited. ML can detect patterns that are difficult to express as rules, further reducing manual categorization. This is a major market trend.
acceptance_criteria: ML model trained on organization's historical categorization data
Model suggests category with confidence score
User corrections feed back to improve model
Model performance dashboard for admins
Fallback to rule-based when ML confidence is low
user_stories: As an Accountant, I want the system to learn from my corrections so that categorization improves over time
As a Manager, I want ML-powered categorization to handle complex patterns that are hard to express as rules

features.title: Anomaly Detection and Alerts
features.description: Implement AI-powered anomaly detection to identify unusual transactions. Alert users to potential fraud, duplicate payments, or unusual spending patterns.
features.rationale: Proactive anomaly detection prevents financial losses and fraud. This is a significant value-add that no competitor offers and addresses market trend for AI in finance.
acceptance_criteria: System flags transactions that deviate significantly from historical patterns
Duplicate payment detection based on amount, counterparty, and timing
Unusual timing detection (e.g., weekend payments, unusual hours)
Configurable alert thresholds
Alert dashboard and email notifications for flagged items
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want to be alerted to unusual transactions so that I can investigate potential fraud
As an Accountant, I want duplicate payment warnings so that I can prevent paying the same invoice twice

features.title: Direct Bank API Integrations
features.description: Implement direct integrations with major Russian banks (Tinkoff, Sberbank, Alfa-Bank) to fetch transactions without going through 1C. Real-time transaction updates.
features.rationale: While 1C integration is the core differentiator, direct bank integrations would provide real-time data and work for users without 1C. This expands the addressable market.
acceptance_criteria: Integration with at least 2 major Russian banks
OAuth-based secure bank connection
Near-real-time transaction sync (within 1 hour)
Reconciliation between direct bank data and 1C data
Clear data source indication in transaction list
user_stories: As a Finance Manager, I want real-time bank transaction data so that I see payments immediately
As a user without 1C, I want to connect my bank directly so that I can use the categorization features

features.title: Multi-Tenant and White-Label Support
features.description: Implement multi-tenant architecture for SaaS deployment. Add white-label customization (logos, colors, custom domain) for enterprise customers.
features.rationale: For scaling the business beyond individual deployments, multi-tenant SaaS model is needed. White-label attracts accounting firms who want to offer to their clients.
acceptance_criteria: Database schema supports tenant isolation
Admin portal for tenant management
White-label configuration (logo, colors, email templates)
Custom domain support per tenant
Usage-based billing infrastructure
user_stories: As an Accounting Firm, I want to offer branded expense management to my clients
As a SaaS Operator, I want to onboard new customers without manual setup
